title: Dover Reports Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2022 Results - PR Newswire
summary: Dover Corporation reported strong financial results for the fourth quarter and full year of 2022, with an 8% year-over-year increase in revenue. Despite a decrease in net earnings, adjusted net earnings showed an 18% increase due to productivity improvements and pricing actions. The company remains optimistic about growth in 2023, citing healthy demand trends and an elevated order backlog. Dover has continued investments in acquisitions and capital expenditures to enhance its efficiency and market position.

green_product: FALSE - No specific product is identified in the article that noticeably meets the criteria of a green product designed to reduce environmental impact throughout its life cycle.
green_process: FALSE - The article does not mention any specific processes that minimize environmental impacts and promote sustainability, focusing instead on business performance and financial metrics.

title: Kohler Previews New 26kW Home Standby Generator and New Exclusive Colors at CES 2023 USA - English - USA ... - PR Web
summary: Kohler Co. showcased its new 26kW air-cooled home standby generator and 10 exclusive colors at the Consumer Electronics Show in January 2023. The new designs aim to enhance customization for consumers while emphasizing rigorous environmental testing to ensure color longevity. Kohler also collaborated with Mossy Oak to offer camouflage patterns on its generators, promoting aesthetics that blend with the environment. The 26RCA generator is highlighted for its performance, durability, and automatic operation during power outages.
green_innovation: TRUE, because the innovations aim to minimize environmental impacts through rigorous testing and aesthetic options that allow homeowners to blend their generators into the environment, promoting sustainability.
business_innovation: TRUE, because the introduction of the new generator model and exclusive customization options represent a significant improvement in Kohler's product offerings.
green_product: TRUE, as the new generator is designed with emphasis on sustainability and minimizes environmental impacts throughout its life cycle.
green_process: FALSE, because while there are elements of innovation, the article does not specifically describe a unique method or technique aimed at minimizing environmental impacts in the production or operational processes.

title: Kohler Co. Celebrates 150 Years of Bold Moves, Creativity, and Impact While Shaping the Next 150 Years of Its Iconic ... - PR Newswire
summary: Kohler Co. is celebrating its 150th anniversary by promoting its brand pillars of design, innovation, wellness, and sustainability through various initiatives, including product launches and partnerships with artists. The company emphasizes its commitment to continuous improvement and the creation of impactful products while engaging associates and customers in the celebration. The year-long campaign, themed 'Come All Creators', showcases Kohler's heritage and innovative spirit. Events and product activations are planned globally, highlighting Kohler's sustained leadership in design and sustainability.

title: Kohler Co. Appoints Laura Kohler as Company's First Chief Sustainability and DEI Officer - PR Newswire
summary: Kohler Co. has appointed Laura Kohler as its first Chief Sustainability and Diversity, Equity and Inclusion Officer to enhance sustainability and social impact across its business operations. The company has a long-standing commitment to environmental sustainability, with initiatives aimed at addressing climate change, water scarcity, and promoting diversity and inclusion. Kohler's strategy, 'Believing in Better', focuses on creating a better planet, communities, and lives through innovative products and programs. The company continues to invest in sustainable practices and has outlined ambitious 2035 Net Zero goals.

title: Kohler Showcases Kitchen and Bath Category Leadership at CES 2023 with New Smart Innovations and Designs to ... - PR Newswire
summary: Kohler Co. is showcasing a lineup of innovative smart products at CES 2023 aimed at enhancing well-being and improving water management efficiency. Featured products include the Anthem Smart Showering System, the Statement VES Showerhead that uses less water, and the H2Wise Smart Water Monitoring System that detects leaks. These products are designed to provide a luxurious experience while promoting sustainability by reducing water consumption. Kohler's efforts align with their sustainability strategy, 'Believing in Better,' which focuses on creating a positive impact for the planet and communities.

title: Kohler Introduces New Wellness Brand, Sprig - PR Newswire
summary: Kohler Co. has introduced Sprig, a new wellness brand that offers innovative shower infusion systems and self-care products designed to enhance daily routines and create at-home spa experiences. The products, which include shower infusion pods, bath bombs, and mists, are formulated with clean, natural ingredients and are designed to be environmentally friendly through the use of recycled materials. Sprig aims to transform standard routines into premium self-care rituals using botanical blends. Products are available for pre-sale and include a focus on elevating consumers' personal care experiences.
green_innovation: TRUE: The products use clean, natural ingredients and are designed with sustainability in mind, including packaging made from 94% post-consumer recycled material.

green_product: TRUE: Sprig's products, such as shower infusion pods and bath bombs, are created to minimize environmental impact and made with premium, non-toxic ingredients.

title: KOHLER PRESENTS HERITAGE COLORS - PR Newswire
summary: Kohler Co. has launched the Heritage Colors campaign, celebrating its historical use of vibrant colors in design and allowing consumers to vote on which colors will be included in a new product collection. The campaign features six vintage colorways and accompanying events in New York City with promotional offerings. The winning colors will be announced at the Kitchen & Bath Industry Show 2023, where limited editions of popular products will be offered in these shades. Kohler emphasizes its legacy in design while engaging consumers in a celebratory voting process.
